description: Retrieves code snippets from findings that Amazon Inspector detected code vulnerabilities in.

nested_items.name: codeSnippetResults
nested_items.description: The retrieved code snippets associated with the provided finding ARNs.

nested_items.name: codeSnippet
nested_items.description: Contains information on the retrieved code snippet.

nested_items.name: content
nested_items.description: The content of a line of code.

nested_items.name: lineNumber
nested_items.description: The line number that a section of code is located at.

nested_items.name: endLine
nested_items.description: The line number of the last line of a code snippet.

nested_items.name: findingArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of a finding that the code snippet is associated with.

nested_items.name: startLine
nested_items.description: The line number of the first line of a code snippet.

nested_items.name: suggestedFixes
nested_items.description: Details of a suggested code fix.

nested_items.name: errors
nested_items.description: Any errors Amazon Inspector encountered while trying to retrieve the requested code snippets.

nested_items.name: errorCode
nested_items.description: The error code for the error that prevented a code snippet from being retrieved.

nested_items.name: errorMessage
nested_items.description: The error message received when Amazon Inspector failed to retrieve a code snippet.

nested_items.name: findingArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the finding that a code snippet couldn't be retrieved for.
